amendment.description: To provide protections for human subjects in research conducted or supported by the Department of Homeland Security.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3952 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3952 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Kennedy. To provide protections for human subjects in research conducted or supported by the Department of Homeland Security.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3952 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3952 proposed by Senator Lieberman for Senator Kennedy.
